definitions.definition: The act of building or putting up or together of something.

examples: The Empire State Building was once the world's tallest erection .

definitions.definition: Formal approval and official establishment of an institution such as a society or a monastery by higher church authorities.
The physiological process by which erectile tissue , such as a penis or clitoris , becomes erect by being engorged with blood .
The state or quality of being erect from engorgement with blood .
definitions.label_groups: uncountable , physiology , of a penis or clitoris

definitions.definition: A penis or clitoris that is erect .
examples: He placed his newspaper on his lap to hide his erection .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The act of building or putting up or together of something.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable or countable , ecclesiastical ) Formal approval and official establishment of an institution such as a society or a monastery by higher church authorities.
( uncountable , physiology ) The physiological process by which erectile tissue , such as a penis or clitoris , becomes erect by being engorged with blood .
( uncountable , physiology , of a penis or clitoris ) The state or quality of being erect from engorgement with blood .
( countable ) A penis or clitoris that is erect .
